import{apiService}from"./apiService";const portfolioService={// Get all public portfolios
getPublicPortfolios:async()=>{const response=await apiService.get("/portfolio/public/all");return response.data;},// Get user's portfolios
getUserPortfolios:async()=>{const response=await apiService.get("/portfolio");return response.data;},// Get single portfolio by ID
getPortfolio:async id=>{const response=await apiService.get("/portfolio/".concat(id));return response.data;},// Create new portfolio
createPortfolio:async portfolioData=>{const response=await apiService.post("/portfolio",portfolioData);return response.data;},// Update portfolio
updatePortfolio:async(id,portfolioData)=>{const response=await apiService.put("/portfolio/".concat(id),portfolioData);return response.data;},// Delete portfolio
deletePortfolio:async id=>{const response=await apiService.delete("/portfolio/".concat(id));return response.data;}};export default portfolioService;
